Amazing Video Appears To Show Army Helping Protestors reports: Would-be looters broke into Cairo's famed Egyptian Museum, ripping the heads off two mummies and damaging about 10 small artifacts before being caught and detained by soldiers, Egypt's antiquities chief said Saturday. Zahi Hawass said the vandals did not manage to steal any of the museum's antiquities, and that the prized collection was now safe and under military guard. prepares to open the first dealership in Los Angeles Monday and deliver the first batch of special edition Prima Edizione Fiat 500s next month. Sergio Marchionne , CEO of both Chrysler and Fiat, said the Fiat 500 doesn't have ambitions to conquer the U.S. market. It was designed for select areas. Volumes are small. Of 120,000 units to be built annually at Chrysler's Toluca, Mexico, plant, half are for North America and the rest are bound for Brazil and China. The

After several years of contests that were panned by critics and many viewers, the producers are promising more input from professional music producers, more entertaining performances by contestants and fewer distractions from surprise guests. We have got to go back to creating an American idol, said Simon Cowell Nigel Lythgoe , who helped create "Idol" and returned to it last fall after two years away.
